In 2006, Eric Schmidt was elected to the National Academy of Engineering, which recognized his work on the development of strategies for the world's most successful Internet search engine company. Eric Schmidt was inducted into the AmEric Schmidtan Academy of Arts and Sciences as a fellow in 2007. He is also chairman of the board of directors for the New AmEric Schmidta Foundation.
